TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintPreviewControl extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 窗体应用程序打印预览的原始预览部分，没有任何对话框或按钮。

span.span: Represents the raw preview part of print previewing from a Windows Forms application, without any dialog boxes or buttons.

summary.span: 大多数 对象都可在 对象上找到，但这不是必需的。

span.span: Most objects are found on objects, but they do not have to be.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建的实例类，则一些读/写属性被设置为初始值。When you create an instance of the class, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. 有关打印功能与 Windows 窗体的详细信息，请参阅命名空间概述。For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the namespace overview. 如果你想要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates the , , and properties of the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码放置在窗体并调用`InitializePrintPreviewControl`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example, place the following code in a form and call the `InitializePrintPreviewControl` method from the form’s constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControlExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`、方法调整大小时比例页控件。If the property is set to `true`, the method resizes the page in proportion to the control. 如果是`false`、中心上控件的页面。If is `false`, the centers the page on the control.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`PrintPreviewControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PrintPreviewControl1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#654](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#654)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#654](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#654)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抗锯齿删除参差不齐呈现字体的行。Anti-aliasing removes jagged lines when fonts are rendered. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates the , , and properties of the . 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码放置在窗体并调用`InitializePrintPreviewControl`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example, place the following code in a form and call the `InitializePrintPreviewControl` method from the form’s constructor or event-handling method.
